acceptance_criteria: Users can add, view, edit, and delete different types of financial accounts (checking, savings, credit card, cash, investments) with appropriate details and categorization

user_stories.title: View Accounts List
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: As a user, I want to view a list of all my financial accounts so that I can see my overall financial portfolio

tasks.task: Create account list UI component
Create account API endpoint to fetch accounts
Create account service with dummy data
Add unit tests for account service
Add component tests for account list

user_stories.title: Add New Account
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: As a user, I want to add new financial accounts so that I can track all my finances in one place

tasks.task: Create account form UI component
Create API endpoint to add accounts
Update account service to handle adding accounts
Add unit tests for adding accounts
Add component tests for account form

user_stories.title: Edit Account
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: As a user, I want to edit account details so that I can update information or correct errors

tasks.task: Create edit account UI component
Create API endpoint to update accounts
Update account service to handle editing accounts
Add unit tests for editing accounts
Add component tests for edit account form

user_stories.title: Delete Account
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: As a user, I want to delete accounts so that I can remove accounts I no longer use

tasks.task: Add delete functionality to account list UI
Create API endpoint to delete accounts
Update account service to handle deleting accounts
Add unit tests for deleting accounts
Add component tests for delete functionality

user_stories.title: Categorize Accounts
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: As a user, I want to categorize my accounts by type and institution so that I can organize them logically

tasks.task: Create account type and institution selection UI components
Create API endpoints to fetch account types and institutions
Create services for account types and institutions with dummy data
Update account service to handle categorization
Add unit tests for account categorization
Add component tests for categorization UI

user_stories.title: View Account Details
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: As a user, I want to view detailed information about a specific account so that I can see its current status and history

tasks.task: Create account detail UI component
Create API endpoint to fetch account details
Update account service to provide detailed account information
Add unit tests for account details
Add component tests for account detail view

user_stories.title: Track Account Balances
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: As a user, I want to track the current balance of each account so that I know how much money I have

tasks.task: Add balance display to account list and detail UI
Update account service to calculate and track balances
Add unit tests for balance tracking
Add component tests for balance display
